main.about_text: PPL Solutions was founded on 7 September 2024, by Wietsegaming and MaleklecoCZE with the goal to make a successful and friendly VTC where people from all over the world can hang out and drive with each other.
main.friendly_staff_text: We have a small but extremely friendly staff team that can help you with any problem you might face while driving for us.
main.save_edits_text: Our drivers have access to a wide variety of custom-made save-edits, including full-sets of trucks, custom parts, and much more.
main.custom_mods_text: We also offer some exclusive PPL Solutions mods for our drivers to use while playing singleplayer or convoys mode.

footer.footer_info: Founded on 7 September 2024, our goal is to create a community where people can connect and enjoy trucking together.
footer.footer_message: Hello there traveler, My name is Wietsegaming. Welcome on the website of the Virtual Trucking Company: PPL Solutions, we stand for driver comfort and the fun in doing great things together.
